Olympic Games.name: American Pastimes: A Sporting Quiz
Olympic Games.description: Test your knowledge of American sports and their connection to the Olympic Games. This quiz covers a range of popular games and iconic moments in American sporting history. From baseball to tennis, see how well you know the fundamentals!

questions.text: What sporting event is held annually on Memorial Day weekend?
In what year did the United States last win an Olympic gold medal in men's ice hockey?
In baseball, how many balls make a walk?
In what year did the United States last win an Olympic gold medal in men's ice hockey?
In bowling, how many pins must you knock down to get a strike?
In American football, how many points is a touchdown worth?
Whom did Billie Jean King defeat in the famous 'Battle of the Sexes' tennis match?
In what sport do athletes compete for the Walker Cup?

Olympic Games.name: Frozen Glory: Hockey History
Olympic Games.description: Dive into the history of American men's ice hockey and test your knowledge of Olympic triumphs and memorable moments. This quiz focuses on the United States' journey to Olympic gold and the challenges faced along the way.

questions.text: In what year did the United States last win an Olympic gold medal in men's ice hockey?
